page.title: Ubiquiti Networks UniFi Switch Lite 8 PoE

revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Switch |image1 = Ubiquiti Networks UniFi Switch Lite 8 PoE.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 8-Port Layer 2 Gigabit PoE Switch |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://store.ui.com/us/en/products/usw-lite-8-poe |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |fandom = <!-- infodepot.fandom page, included underscores --> |wikidevi = Ubiquiti_Networks_UniFi_Switch_Lite_8_PoE |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = UniFi Switch |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = Lite |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = USW-Lite-8-PoE |page_start_date = 12/10/2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Ubiquiti_Networks_UniFi_Switch_Lite_8_PoE |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |pcb_id = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = D8:B3:70
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8380M; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = 4KEc |cpu1spd = 500<!-- --> |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12835FMI-10G; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W631GG8NB-12; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->
|eth_cpu = true
|sw_cpu = true
|eth_ports = 8 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = yes |sw_class = managed
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIExpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_poe_type = af/at |pwr_poe = 54 |pwr_poe_amp = 1.1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J1 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = 802.3at PoE Interface and DC/DC Controller;TI;TPS23754;;1;,,, 802.3at PoE 4 port PSE Controller/Manager;Microchip;PD69104B1;;1;,,, 1MHz, 2A Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi;uP9617P;;2;,,, 8-bit Shift Register w/ 3-State Output;Unisonic;U74AHC595;;2;,,, DC Input Half-Pitch Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-217;;2;,,, 3.0kV RMS Dual I2C Isolator;2Pai Semi;π220N31;;1;,,, 100V N-Channel Power MOSFET;TI;CSD19534Q5A;;1;,,, Quadruple Bus Buffer Gate;TI;SN74LVC125A;;1;, |flags = smart switch, PoE Switch, heat sink |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2020 |price = 120 |upc = 810010071101 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIBBB1J9M7334 |asin = B08KC6KT1F |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Vietnam
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== "UBIQUITI®", "NETWORKS", "©2020", and "USW-LITE-8-POE" :are silkscreened on the board.
===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Realtek]] RTL8380M Multi-Layer Managed Switch :Controller with Embedded MIPS 4KEc @500MHz *Flash/RAM: 16MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 128MB (DDR3) SDRAM *LAN: 8x GbE (RJ45) ports, 4x w/ PoE+ capability *PoE: 802.3af (PoE), 802.3at (PoE+), 52W PoE budget :16Gbps switching capacity
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:USW-Lite-8-PoE Top.jpeg|Board Top File:USW-Lite-8-PoE Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
